name: The Orient Express
description:
Join Heidi Price aboard the Orient Express and help track down answers to the unsolved disappearance of Anna Clairemont.

Investigate the case by finding hidden objects, piecing together clues and interviewing the witnesses to reveal a mystery that reaches into the dark forces of this world.


FEATURES

DIFFERENT GAMES MODES
3 modes of hidden object gameplay: Classic Hidden Object, Hidden
Collection and Spot the Difference

STORY TELLING
Excitingly narrated detective story around a case of murder on the Orient Express

HIGH DEFINITION GRAPHICS
Hundred of hidden objects to be found in high definition graphics environments

Hours of puzzle fun!


SUPPORT

Problems & Questions:
Visit www.kalypsomediamobile.com or write us an e-mail at supportmobile@kalypsomedia.com

Privacy Policy:

NOTE
• For the best possible experience, we recommend a Wi-Fi connection.
• Parts of this game requires an active Internet connection.
• Watching adverts will increase your data consumption.
• Depending on the network used, performance can vary.
